b1c7c893-4db3-4eb4-8ef6-95b45a14cddf.title: Assassin's Creed III
b1c7c893-4db3-4eb4-8ef6-95b45a14cddf.description: Assassin's Creed III is a 2012 action-adventure video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the fifth major installment in the Assassin's Creed series, and a direct sequel to 2011's Assassin's Creed: Revelations.

61ebc58b-41cf-48a0-be95-16568b7bda7a.content: This game is so beautiful and the story is incredible

53a21c75-1919-4b6e-9a1e-44993716e569.title: Counter-Strike 1.6
53a21c75-1919-4b6e-9a1e-44993716e569.description: Counter-Strike (also known as Half-Life: Counter-Strike or Counter-Strike 1.6)[5] is a tactical first-person shooter game developed by Valve. It was initially developed and released as a Half-Life modification by Minh Gooseman Le and Jess Cliffe in 1999, before Le and Cliffe were hired and the game's intellectual property acquired.

4ab2ca21-d74e-4c41-897b-64f95d331f56.content: My childhood game. I played so much.
